CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 29, 1950, pg. 16, reads: "BARTENDERS' DEAN ILL - Asa Harris (Pop) Harris, partner in Asa Harris' Grill, is shown in Presbyterian Hospital this week after he "blacked out" and fell over the bannister on a stairway in his establishment injuring himself. Visiting him is his partner Al Johnson, and a friend, Henry Thompson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Asa C. "Pop" Harris lying in hospital bed, injured after a fall in his Harris Hotel and Grill, with Al Johnson or Henry Thompson, and woman wearing dark beret standing next to him, in Presbyterian Hospital
